summary: Web developer who is a go-to expert for git, ES6, accessibility and Slack. Looking for work in full-stack web developer roles, and wants to move into data analytics in the future. Likes to poke fun at friends by coding up their startup ideas.

info: Gathered feature requirements and ensured satisfaction by proactively meeting with users. Two out of six survey respondents indicated the software met their needs extremely well and four indicated very well.

Performed accessibility testing and discovered fifty accessibility-related defects, including some that were not found during testing of the previous release. Presented tutorial on screen-reader technology to fifty team members, due to recognized expertise.
